name: amc-mcp
description: An MCP server that helps users plan, select, book, and pay for AMC movie experiences
author: AMC MCP Server Team

tools.name: get_now_showing
tools.description: Returns a list of movies currently showing in a given city or ZIP code

tools.name: get_recommendations
tools.description: Suggests movies based on mood, genre, or time preferences

tools.name: get_showtimes
tools.description: Fetches available showtimes for a specific movie and location

tools.name: get_seat_map
tools.description: Displays available and reserved seats for a specific showtime

tools.name: book_seats
tools.description: Reserves selected seats for the user
